name: Klick Magic Solutions
tag_list: website-design, website-development, logo-design, web-banner-design, banner-advertising, landing-pages, newsletter-design, apps, web-applications, photo-editing, html5-banner, video-banner-design, website-maintenance, mobile-websites, ipad-websites, graph
overview:
Klick magic solutions is an interactive agency which creates and develops brand/ performance specific campaigns for the digital media world we also creates user-centered websites which give organizations a serious competitive edge. By understanding your business and listening to your customers, we create beautiful interactive experiences that deliver. Driven from a passion for engineering and design we strive to roll out new and refreshing online concepts for our clients.

We are a team of specialists: designers, developers, authors, and thinkers with a reputation for user-centered design, accessibility and web standards. Specialties

Website Design & Development, E-learning, Presentations, Digital Marketing Campaigns, Print Ads (Brochures, Business Cards), Facebook & Mobile Applications, Flash Banners, XML Banners, API Banners, E-mailers, Newsletter, Graphic Design, E-commerce/UI, Landing Pages.
